About the Game

To the far east, there lies a small island nation known as Yamato. Once peaceful, it is now engulfed in bloody conflict.

The ruling shogunate is served by Hozuki, a team of enforcers who maintain order and purge the shogunate’s enemies.

Day and night, they fight against Byakuya, an organization seeking to overthrow the shogunate.

Some strive to maintain order, and some strive to bring about a new era. Those known as samurai risk it all to realize their ideals.

Mukuro, a member of Hozuki, must decide whether she remains loyal to the shogunate or harbors doubts that lead her to join Byakuya. Or she may choose to trust no one and forge her own path as a ronin, beholden only to herself.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Unique Fantasy Setting
  • Three Story Routes to Explore!

data.short_description: Mukuro is a member of the shogunate's personal enforcer group Hozuki. Her view of the world will be challenged, and she must decide whether to remain loyal, or to try and forge her own path in a war-torn world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
